## BlockSvg.moveTo() method

Move a block to a position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moveTo(xy: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xy | Coordinate | The position to move to in workspace units. |
